title: The Town Fool
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Town Fool
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones weighs in on Nets PG Kyrie Irving “talking himself out of the NBA” with anti-Semitic rhetoric (0:57). Plus, an IYHH including the ramifications of billionaire Elon Musk’s purchase of Twitter (28:51), and your voicemails about that time “your mama showed up early” (42:11)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @DoranyPineda90 shares how Californians are struggling to pay for water: https://lat.ms/3TQGFBe
  2.  @_katya_long shares how Amazon workers say minor aches suddenly became debilitating: https://bit.ly/3sLWP2P
  3. @willoremus shares how social media censorship became a front line in the cultural war:  https://wapo.st/3UfsDbR
